title: Kyuukyoku no Chef wa Oishinbo Papa
original_name: 究極のシェフは美味しんぼパパ
sinopse:
Kenzou Nishikata, 43, has gone from private investigator to chef and now runs the restaurant "Chinchinken" in Kichijoji. However, this restaurant is just a facade that hides a much darker activity.

(Source: NTT Solmare, translated)
